narrative:
This is the 2nd prelicense inspection for a Class A license.  No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection. 
The licensing fee must be mailed to: 
 
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care 
2150 Centre Ave. 
Building B, 3W11 
Fort Collins, CO 80526 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant. 
 
This inspection was delayed due to COVID. 
 
End Section
